sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 'Azure SQL Database' as SourceType,
s.name as SourceSchema,
DB_NAME() as SourceDB,
t.name as SourceTableName,
'' as SourceDateColumn,
''as SourceKeyColumn,
'dvsynapse' as Destination,
t.name as DestinationTable,
0 as ExistingTable,
'Full Load' as LoadType,
0 as SkipLoad,
'' as WatermarkColumn,
'' as LastWatermarkValue,
GETDATE() as BatchLoadDate FROM sys.schemas s JOIN sys.tables t on s.schema_id = t.schema_id WHERE s.name ='SalesLT'
GROUP BY s.name, t.name
